generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings, which is the primary surface for vehicle travel.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible on the right side of the road, bordered by a curb and trees.
- vegetation: Numerous trees and some bushes are visible along both sides of the road and in the background.
- terrain: Grass and fallen leaves are present on the right side of the road, forming the terrain.
- car: A red car is prominently visible in the foreground on the left side of the road, and other cars are visible further down the road.
- pole: A vertical pole with a traffic sign is visible on the left side of the road.
- traffic sign: A white traffic sign with a red border and an "H" symbol is mounted on a pole on the left side of the road.
- person: A person can be seen walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the road, further down the path.
- building: A building is partially visible in the background on the right side of the road, behind the trees.
